title: Set alias for columns does not reflect in expression builder when selecting the dataset
description: When setting an alias for a column in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: After setting an alias for a column in a dataset, the expression builder should reflect the updated alias instead of displaying the old column name.
EB: Even after setting an alias for a column in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the original column name when selecting the dataset.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for a column in the dataset, e.g., 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset - observe that the original column name is displayed instead of the alias.
